nodes.label: Identify Cricket Query Type
nodes.question: What type of cricket question is this (match result, player stats, records, strategy, tournament)?

nodes.label: Determine Format & Scope
nodes.question: Which format (Test, ODI, T20, IPL) and time period does this query cover?

nodes.label: Search Match Records
nodes.question: Find relevant matches from the knowledge base matching teams, players, venue, or date.

nodes.label: Compute Statistics
nodes.question: Calculate aggregated stats (runs, wickets, averages, strike rates) from matched records.

nodes.label: Analyze Context & Conditions
nodes.question: Consider venue, pitch, toss, opposition strength, and match situation.

nodes.label: Compare & Rank
nodes.question: Compare performances, head-to-head records, or rank players/teams.

nodes.label: Cite Match Data
nodes.question: Reference specific match IDs, dates, venues, and scorecards.

nodes.label: Provide Expert Insight
nodes.question: Add analytical commentary on patterns, trends, and strategic implications.
